name: H Girl
description:
introduction

H Girl is a puzzle game. Players only need to swap the tiles to restore the picture. For players without patience, the game supports the cheat mode: one click to auto swap the puzzle. There is no time, score, or ranking limitation in the game. It is only for players' joy.

features

  • 50 high resolution original images
  • Relaxing music
  • Auto swap
  • Zoom In/Out
  • Historical gallery
